arts.ttl: Conor Coventry admits crucial first Charlton Athletic goal was “a little bit scrappy”
arts.sum: “It’s tough because we’re on the back of a couple of losses and we’re not where we want to be or think we have the capability to be in the league. Charlton had been winless in five league matches before this evening and came into the fixture against the bottom club in the division badly in need of a positive result.

arts.ttl: Conor Coventry’s first Charlton goal sinks 10-man Burton
arts.sum: Coventry finally broke the Brewers’ resistance with eight minutes to go after Charlie Webster had been sent off.

arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic captain’s 343 matches without red card ended as he misses games against Burton, Walsall and Crawley
arts.sum: “We weren’t able to be as aggressive or front-footed as we want but even with that, we created three or four good chances in the second-half that we should have scored. Docherty will miss tonight’s match at Burton Albion, Saturday’s FA Cup second round tie against Walsall and next Tuesday’s home fixture against Crawley Town.

arts.ttl: Preview: Burton Albion vs. Charlton Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's League One clash between Burton Albion and Charlton Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
